member.name: T:STG.Common.DTO.DtoActivityProcessDefinition
member.summary: Defines a process definition of a single activity instance

member.name: P:STG.Common.DTO.DtoActivityProcessDefinition.IsEndActivity
member.summary: if set to true, this activity will terminate the process and cause the process service to delete the processed work items

member.name: P:STG.Common.DTO.DtoActivityProcessDefinition.IsMerger
member.summary: if set to true, this activity will receive child work items (if any). Also any child work item entered in this activity will not be saved as "Ready" but "WaitingMerge" status.

member.name: P:STG.Common.DTO.DtoActivityProcessDefinition.CollectsWorkItemAudits
member.summary: if set to true, this activity will collect work item audits.

member.name: P:STG.Common.DTO.DtoActivityProcessDefinition.CollectsDocumentAudits
member.summary: if set to true, this activity will collect document audits. Also any child work item entered in this activity will not be saved as "Ready" but "WaitingMerge" status.

member.name: P:STG.Common.DTO.DtoActivityProcessDefinition.ForceDataPersistance
member.summary: if the activity instance is used in transactional processing and this flag set to true then the data will be committed in database, but the transactional processing will continue

member.name: P:STG.Common.DTO.DtoActivityProcessDefinition.ForceDataPersistence
member.summary: if the activity instance is used in transactional processing and this flag set to true then the data will be committed in database, but the transactional processing will continue

member.name: P:STG.Common.DTO.DtoActivityProcessDefinition.StopsTransactionalProcessing
member.summary: if activity instance is used in transactional processing, and this flag is set to true, then this activity will release the work item and terminate transactional processing

member.name: P:STG.Common.DTO.DtoActivityProcessDefinition.StopIfNewInstance
member.summary: if this is a time driven activity, and no routes are leading to it, this flag should be set to true during designtime and it should stop the activity's processing if a new instance was published

member.name: P:STG.Common.DTO.DtoActivityProcessDefinition.MultiRoutesBehavior
member.summary: defines a work item behavior if multiple routes matches the work item

member.name: P:STG.Common.DTO.DtoActivityProcessDefinition.PriorityFactor
member.summary: The priority adjustment that the current activity must apply; default is 1
